creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: white and brown stripes and thin yellow stripes; closed sides; decorated in T-shaped areas at top on front and back; multicolored geometric designs with vertical rows of multicolored handled pitchers, diamond and interlocking diamond motifs; area around square collar decorated with rose-colored ground with blue and yellow 3-D flowers and checkerboard borders in blues, orange, green, white, purple and yellow
title: Huipil
